item.title: Blog - Applying Python in data science - Clustering
item.description: While R is a program commonly used in data science and statistics, python can also be used to accomplish similar purposes. Various data manipulations can be done on both programs. In the example below, clustering is completed using R and python on the iris dataset. In R, clustering was done using kmeans. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.
